The final installment in the Half-Life series, ending with a cliffhanger bigger than my hopes
when I try to bang on my girlfriend.

Anyways, the setting is fascinatingly beautiful. 
White Forest is awesome.. 
The mines look dope as hell..
Well, all that is nice, but will it have the same problems as Ep1 did?
(See my review on Ep1)
Fortunately, no! Ep2 is much more smoother and at least I did not find any big frustrating moments from the start to the end.
Now, I do not want go on and on about the ending, so lets just cut this here.
There is a big chance noone will read this anyways.
I recommend, but play Hl2 and Ep1 before first.
THIS GAME IS THE BEST ON GOD

Valve's potential swan song for Half Life finishes up strong with the strong gameplay the series is known for. The episode is short through, so pick this up with the other episode and the main game for a fantastic experience.
Final inconcluso, a falta de que saquen el Half life 3.
